charger: Obtain 1 DP after this unit defeats an enemy; Refunds the original DP Cost when retreated
tactician: This unit can designate one Tactical Point within attack range to call Reinforcements; ATK is increased to 150% when attacking enemies blocked by Reinforcements
bearer: Cannot block enemies during the skill duration
instructor: Can attack enemies from range; When attacking enemies not blocked by self, increase ATK to 120%
lord: Can launch Ranged Attacks that deal 80% of normal ATK
musha: Can't be healed by other units. Recovers 30/50/70 (scales with elite promotion) self HP every time this operator attacks an enemy
reaper:
Cannot be healed by allies
Attack all enemies within range
Recovers 50 HP with every enemy hit (up to block count)
librator:
Does not attack and have 0 block count normally
Gradually increase attack power up to +200% after 40 seconds when skill is not active
Attack increase resets after skill ends
guardian: Can heal allies by using the skill
artsprotector: Normal attacks deal Arts damage while the skill is active
duelist: Only restores SP when blocking enemies
longrange: Prioritizes attacking the enemy with lowest DEF within range first
reaperrange: Attacks all enemies within range, and deals 150% damage to enemies in the row directly in front of this unit.
bombarder: Attacks deal two instances of Physical damage to ground enemies in a small area (The second instance is a shockwave that has half the normal ATK)
funnel: Controls a Drone to deal Arts damage to an enemy; When the Drone continuously attacks the same enemy, its damage will increase (up to 110% of the operator's ATK)
phalanx: Normally does not attack, but has +200% DEF and +20 RES; When skill is active, attacks deal AoE Arts damage
mystic: Attacks deal Arts damage; When unable to find a target, attacks can be stored up and fired all at once (Up to 3 charges)
chain: Attacks deal Arts damage and jump between 3 (4 at Elite 2) enemies. Each jump deals 20% less damage and inflicts a brief Slow
blastcaster: Deals AOE Arts damage in a long line
ringhealer: Restores the HP of 3 allies simultaneously
healer: Has a large healing range, but the healing amount on farther targets is reduced to 70%
slower: Deals Arts damage and Slows the target for a short time
bard: Does not attack but continuously restores the HP of all allies within range (the HP restored per second is equal to 10% of self ATK). Self is unaffected by Inspiration
summoner:
Deals Arts damage
Can use Summons in battles
pusher:
Can attack all blocked enemies
Can be deployed on Ranged Grids
stalker:
Deals Damage to all targets within range
50% chance to dodge Physical and Arts attacks and is less likely to be targeted by enemies
hookmaster:
Can Shift enemies by using skills
Can be deployed on Ranged Grids
geek: Continually loses 3% max HP per second
merchant: Has reduced Redeployment Time, but DP Cost is not refunded upon retreating; While deployed, 3 DP are consumed every 3 seconds (automatically retreats without sufficient DP)
traper: Can use traps to assist in combat, but traps cannot be placed on tiles already occupied by an enemy
dollkeeper: Does not retreat upon receiving lethal damage, instead swaps to a <Substitute> (Substitute has 0 Block). Swaps back to the original after 20 seconds
craftsman:
Can block 2 enemies
Can use Support Devices in battle
wandermedic:
Restores the HP of allies
Recovers Elemental damage equal to 50% of Attack Power
(Can heal Elemental damage of unhurt units)
fortress: Prioritize Long range splash attack when not blocking
